include_clips.description: Whether to include detailed clip information

tools.name: export_current_timeline
tools.description: Export the current timeline from DaVinci Resolve to OTIO format

output_path.description: Optional custom output path for the exported timeline

tools.name: check_resolve_environment
tools.description: Check if the DaVinci Resolve scripting environment is properly configured

tools.name: apply_zoom_to_clip
tools.description: Apply zoom settings to a specific clip for punch-ins and framing adjustments. Useful for adding variety to static shots by zooming in on speakers or important elements.

track_index.description: Track index (1-based) where the clip is located

clip_index.description: Clip index (1-based) on the track to apply zoom to

zoom_value.description: Zoom multiplier (1.0 = normal size, 1.1 = 10% zoom in, 1.2 = 20% zoom in, 2.0 = 100% zoom in)

lock_axes.description: Lock X and Y zoom together (recommended for uniform punch-ins)

description.description: Optional description of the zoom purpose (e.g., 'punch in on speaker', 'focus on product')

tools.name: list_clips_in_tracks
tools.description: List all clips across video tracks with their positions and details. Useful for identifying which clips to apply effects to.

track_type.description: Type of tracks to list clips from

tools.name: reedit_timeline
tools.description: Apply comprehensive editing instructions to the current timeline. This tool calls the re-edit workflow directly, which exports the current timeline, applies AI-powered editing changes, and imports the result back to DaVinci Resolve.

instructions.description: Detailed editing instructions to apply to the timeline (e.g., 'Remove all clips from speaker A', 'Make the timeline 30 seconds shorter', 'Reorder clips to put introduction first')

description.description: Optional description of the editing goal for context

tools.name: test_reedit_environment
tools.description: Test the re-edit environment and verify module import capabilities for direct function calling

tools.name: generate_roughcut
tools.description: Generate a rough cut timeline from transcript data. This tool analyzes the transcript, creates an initial timeline structure, and imports it to DaVinci Resolve.

description.description: Optional description of the rough cut generation goal for context
